pkgmetadata.longdescription: Soil texture classification===========================![PyPI - Downloads](https://img.shields.io/pypi/dm/soiltexture)How to install:**`pip install soiltexture`**Possible classifications:- USDA- FAO- INTERNATIONAL- ISSSUsage:```pythonfrom soiltexture import getTexture, getTexturesgetTexture(13, 50, classification='USDA')# silty loamgetTextures([13, 45], [50, 24], classification='FAO')# ['fine', 'medium']```Requirements:- matplotlib : to use the `path` moduleSource for the .dat file:https://github.com/gmassei/SoilTexture
